folder: Evergreen Avenue & Grove Street, Brooklyn, NY
text:
Evergreen Ave., north side, at and east of Grove Street, showing a section of the Frank Ibert Brewery Co., established in 1891-1892, which was partially destroyed by fire on June 24, 1925.

1924.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

folder: Grove Street & Evergreen Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
text: Grove Street, at the northwest corner of Evergreen Avenue, showing Public School No. 75. The school also faces on Menahan Street. This is a new addtion to the old school building. Board of Education of the City of New York  June 30, 1931

folder: Grove Street & Evergreen Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
text:
Grove street, at the northwest corner of Evergreen Avenue, showing Public School No. 75. This is the Menaham Street, part of the school. The more modern addition of the school is on Grove street.

Board of Education of the City of New York June 30, 1931
